      • fromRotationXYZ

        public static WB_Quaternion fromRotationXYZ(WB_Angle x,
                            WB_Angle y,
                            WB_Angle z)
        Returns a WB_Quaternion created from three Euler angle rotations. The angles represent rotation about their respective unit-axes. The angles are applied in the order X, Y, Z. Angles can be extracted by calling getRotationX(), getRotationY(), getRotationZ().
        Parameters:
        x - WB_Angle rotation about unit-X axis.
        y - WB_Angle rotation about unit-Y axis.
        z - WB_Angle rotation about unit-Z axis.
        Returns:
        WB_Quaternion representation of the combined X-Y-Z rotation.

      • fromLatLon

        public static WB_Quaternion fromLatLon(WB_Angle latitude,
                       WB_Angle longitude)
        Returns a WB_Quaternion created from latitude and longitude rotations. Latitude and longitude can be extracted from a WB_Quaternion by calling getLatLon().
        Parameters:
        latitude - WB_Angle rotation of latitude.
        longitude - WB_Angle rotation of longitude.
        Returns:
        WB_Quaternion representing combined latitude and longitude rotation.
